message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product to offer you for a price of $1000000. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity! While I can't divulge details about this particular product, I assure you it has the potential to be highly valuable.  This is my first sale, so I'm eager to build trust and establish a positive reputation. Consider this a chance to be part of something special!  What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the opportunity to be your first sale, I need more information to make a decision.  With no sales history, I can't gauge the likelihood of this product being high quality.  Perhaps you could provide some details about the product or offer a lower price to incentivize me to take the risk?  I'm eager to do business with you, but I need more information to proceed.
